node.excerpt: Date: May 19, 2020 To: NYU Undergraduates From: NYU Provost Katherine Fleming Dear NYU Undergraduate Students, When this past academic year began, none of us could have imagined the situation in which we now find ourselves, both across the country and around the world. I’m very cognizant of the upheaval it has brought to your lives. We’re proud of the grit you’ve shown in the face of it. I hope…
